channel.title: Vehicles :: Digital Dilemma
channel.description: Some things I’ve done with Land-Rovers and Motorbikes. Land-Rover Motorbikes Others

item.title: Land-Rover
item.description: Best of British. (At least up until 2018 when the last ‘Proper’ Land Rover rolled off the production line at Solihull. I’m no fan of the modern cars.) Why do I like Land Rovers? Teenage boys usually have posters on their wall. Nothing unusual about, I did too. Except mine weren’t of glamour models or music bands. My 1980’s bedroom walls were covered by pictures I’d cut out of 4x4 Magazines. Mostly Land-Rovers.

item.title: Motorbikes
item.description: A late biker, I love exploring Devon and its surrounds on my 2023 Royal Enfield Himalayan Himalayan St Davidstowe

item.title: Others
item.description: I’ve owned a lot of vehicles over the years. Being poor but needing to be mobile, “bangernomics” meant buying cheap and buying often… Here’s some of them. My first car. A 1974 Toyota 1000. Lasted me for many years Mini. Bought for £50 in Plymouth. Started to restore it, but found it was totally rotten with newspaper stuffed into the roof corners as a base for filler. Was towed to a scrap yard
